title: I wasted $877 on MYSTERY TECH
description: Burnt Impressions Custom Toaster:  Dry Studio Black Diamond Keyboard:  Magnesium Cube:   Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:  Threads:   In this episode of Mystery Tech, I unbox some bizarre gadgets including a custom face toaster, vintage bone conduction headphones, and a super light magnesium cube. Things get weird when I "accidentally" buy yet another Palm Pixi phone, much to everyone's amusement.  Chapter Titles: 0:00 Austin Toaster 3:33 Black Diamond Keyboard 6:55 Bone Phone 10:36 Palm Pixi 13:44 Magnesium Cube
